# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title
Development of Canada's Second State of Youth Report (SOYR)

## Tender Reference Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-669-60333050
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: 10230017
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-05
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-27 14:00:00 (-Expired)
* **Project Dates**:
	+ **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
	+ **Expected Contract End Date**: None

## Request for Information (RFI)

The purpose of this RFI is to gather interest, information, feedback, and recommendations regarding the development of Canada's Second State of Youth Report. The RFI seeks input from interested contractors on their ability to meet the requirements outlined in the Description of Requirement, including approximate costs of the required tasks.

## Project Description

The project aims to develop a comprehensive report providing insights into the situation of youth in Canada. The report will analyze the progress and prospects of youth in various domains, including education, employment, and social integration. The contractor will be responsible for conducting research, gathering data, and providing recommendations to stakeholders.

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Nicole Sabourin
* **Email**: contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (819) 271-7204
* **Address**: 15 Eddy Street, Gatineau, QC K1A 0M5, Canada
* **Country**: Canada

## Additional Documents

Two attachments are available for download:

* Request for Information (RFI)
* Request for Information (RFI) - Q&A (October 19) [English and French]

Note: The original attachments can be accessed via the following links: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21503/10230017-request-for-information (RFI), https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21503/10230017-rfi---qa---october-19 (English Q&A), and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21503/10230017-demande-de-renseignements---ddr (French RFI)
